NAME: Utkarsh Agarwal
ABOUT_ME: A B.Tech. Undergraduate student at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, Utkarsh has worked on various projects in diferent fields involving IOTs. He has also been a part of various societies and NGOs in college as well as in Patiala.
PROJECTS:
A low-cost up-gradation of normal printers to smart printers 
Development using Raspberry Pi
A low-cost pollution monitoring device for vehicles.Developed Raspberry Pi robust and reliable hardware, that can be attached to exhausts of vehicles.
A social-cum Academic platform for Thapar University. Designed APIs, backend, and deployed on scalable dynos on Heroku.
